alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:59PM EDT until August 03 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lewis County in central New York... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 758 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Fowler, or 16 miles south of Gouverneur, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisville, Lake Bonaparte, Indian River, Diana Center, and Natural Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
